agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Public Health TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess Wednesday, February 20, 2019 PLACE: E2.026 CHAIR: Rep. Senfronia Thompson The committee will meet for an organizational meeting and hear invited testimony from the following state agencies: Texas State Anatomical Board (SAB) Texas Health Services Authority (THSA) Health Professions Council (HPC) Texas Department of Licensing and Regulation (TDLR) Health and Human Services Commission (HHSC) Department of State Health Services(DSHS) *Invited testimony only NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
